PerfectNetExp.abs: 慕斯（mousse） 是一种奶冻式甜点，可以直接吃或做蛋糕夹层。慕斯同其他种类蛋糕相比，更富含胶原蛋白。
香港人对于慕丝（Mousse）应该不会陌生，这种以蛋白、忌廉及糖作基本材料的甜品，正如其法文的意思─泡沫一样，入口软滑、感 …
慕思（mousse），在法文的原意中，指的是泡沫，气泡。所以品味慕思的最高境界就是体验它轻飘飘入口即化的质地。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French, moss or froth'

entry.tran: (用鸡蛋、奶油制成，通常加入水果和巧克力的)奶油冻，慕斯
entry.def: Mousse is a sweet light food made from eggs and cream. It is often flavoured with fruit or chocolate.
Mousse is a soft substance containing a lot of tiny bubbles, for example one that you can put in your hair to make it easier to shape into a particular style.

means.word_mean: 1. a light creamy dessert set with gelatin
2. a light creamy dish made from fish or meat and set with gelatin
3. toiletry consisting of an aerosol foam used in hair styling
